name: expected game
description:
To reset, simply press Q in game and click RESET GAME, or click reset where available!

If you have problems with nothing happening when trying to upload the images, refresh the game, or play it directly (this page is part of itch.io don't worry), make sure to open the image in a new tab and then copy it!

This game does not work in incognito mode! Please use a guest window if you want to play separately, you can just play in a normal browser though!

This was hell to create and getting it all to work, but it was lots of fun too!

If a server is down or if the Discord bot is broken or whatever, PLEASE comment below. I will fix it when I can but I'm in school a lot of the time.

If you have privacy concerns please use https://temp-mail.org/ or an equivalent!

Space 1990 Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
